amendment.description: To require the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to carry out research and development regarding a crop insurance program for alfalfa.

vote.text: Amendment SA 987 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 18. Record Vote Number: 140.

action.text: Amendment SA 987 proposed by Senator Moran.
